translation.en: [NARRATOR] ONCE UPON A TIME IN A KINGDOM FAR, FAR AWAY,
translation.ko: 아주 먼 옛날 무대는 겁나먼 왕국

translation.en: THE KING AND QUEEN WERE BLESSED WITH A BEAUTIFUL BABY GIRL.

THAT TOOK HOLD EACH AND EVERY NIGHT.

WHO HAD THEM LOCK THE YOUNG PRINCESS AWAY IN A TOWER,

translation.en: THROUGH BLISTERING COLD AND SCORCHING DESERT

WHETHER YOUR PARENTS LIKE IT OR NOT... I AM AN OGRE!
AND GUESS WHAT, PRINCESS? THAT'S NOT ABOUT TO CHANGE.
translation.ko: 더 말해 봐, 공주? 그건 절대 변하지 않아

translation.en: I'VE MADE CHANGES FOR YOU, SHREK. THINK ABOUT THAT.
translation.ko: 난 자길 위해 달라졌어 잘 생각해 봐

translation.en: THAT'S REAL SMOOTH, SHREK. "I'M AN OGRE!"
I KNEW THIS WOULD HAPPEN.
[LILLIAN] YOU SHOULD. YOU STARTED IT.
translation.ko: - 이럴 줄 알았소 - 당신이 자초했잖아요 난 정말 믿어지지가 않소

translation.en: I CAN HARDLY BELIEVE THAT, LILLIAN. HE'S THE OGRE. NOT ME.
translation.ko: 난 정말 믿어지지가 않소 괴물은 내가 아니오

translation.en: I THINK, HAROLD... YOU'RE TAKING THIS A LITTLE TOO PERSONALLY.
THIS IS FIONA'S CHOICE.
BUT SHE WAS SUPPOSED TO CHOOSE THE PRINCE WE PICKED FOR HER.
I MEAN, YOU EXPECT ME TO GIVE MY BLESSINGS
TO THIS... THIS... THING? FIONA DOES.
AND SHE'LL NEVER FORGIVE YOU IF YOU DON'T.
translation.ko: 축복 안 해주면 평생 금이 생길 거예요

translation.en: I DON'T WANT TO LOSE OUR DAUGHTER AGAIN, HAROLD.
OH, YOU ACT AS IF LOVE IS TOTALLY PREDICTABLE.
translation.ko: 사랑은 누구도 예측할 수 없는 거예요

translation.en: DON'T YOU REMEMBER WHEN WE WERE YOUNG
translation.ko: 우리가 젊었던 시절 기억 안 나요?

translation.en: AND WE USED TO WALK DOWN BY THE LILY POND AND...
- THEY WERE IN BLOOM... - OUR FIRST KISS.
IT'S NOT THE SAME!
I DON'T THINK YOU REALIZE THAT OUR DAUGHTER HAS MARRIED A MONSTER!
OH, STOP BEING SUCH A DRAMA KING.
FINE! PRETEND THERE'S NOTHING WRONG!
translation.ko: 좋아! 잘못된 것이 없다고 쳐요 좋았어!

translation.en: LA, DI, DA, DI, DA! ISN'T IT ALL WONDERFUL!
I'D LIKE TO KNOW HOW IT COULD GET ANY WORSE!
- HELLO, HAROLD. - [GASPS]
- WHAT HAPPENED? - NOTHING, DEAR!
translation.ko: - 왜 그래요? - 아무것도 아뇨 십자군 전쟁 때 입은 상처가 도져서!

translation.en: JUST THE OLD CRUSADE WOUND PLAYING UP A BIT!
translation.ko: 십자군 전쟁 때 입은 상처가 도져서!

translation.en: I'LL JUST STRETCH IT OUT HERE FOR A WHILE.
YOU BETTER GET IN. WE NEED TO TALK.
ACTUALLY, FAIRY GODMOTHER, JUST OFF TO BED.
ALREADY TAKEN MY PILLS, AND THEY MAKE ME A BIT DROWSY.
SO, HOW ABOUT... WE MAKE THIS QUICK. WHAT?
OH, HELLO. HA-HA-HA!
SO, WHAT'S NEW?
YOU REMEMBER MY SON, PRINCE CHARMING?
translation.ko: 내 아들 기억하죠? 프린스 챠밍 챠밍 자넨가? 세상에!

translation.en: IS THAT YOU? MY GOSH! IT'S BEEN YEARS.
translation.ko: 챠밍 자넨가? 세상에! 무척 된 거 같은데 언제 왔나?

translation.en: WHEN DID YOU GET BACK?
translation.ko: 무척 된 거 같은데 언제 왔나? 한 5분쯤!

translation.en: OH, ABOUT FIVE MINUTES AGO, ACTUALLY.
AFTER I ENDURED BLISTERING WINDS, SCORCHING DESERT...
I CLIMBED TO THE HIGHEST ROOM IN THE TALLEST TOWER...
MOMMY CAN HANDLE THIS.
HE ENDURES BLISTERING WINDS AND SCORCHING DESERT!
HE CLIMBS TO THE HIGHEST BLOODY ROOM
OF THE TALLEST BLOODY TOWER... AND WHAT DOES HE FIND?
translation.ko: 까마득한 탑의 꼭대기 방에 올라갔더니 - 그 일은… - 뭐가 있었을까요?

translation.en: SOME GENDER-CONFUSED WOLF TELLING HIM THAT HIS PRINCESS
translation.ko: 암수 불명의 늑대가 공주는 이미 - 내가 수습…! - 결혼해 버렸대요

translation.en: IS ALREADY MARRIED. IT WASN'T MY FAULT. HE DIDN'T GET THERE IN TIME.
translation.ko: 내 탓 아니요 왕자가 뒷북친 거요

translation.en: STOP THE CAR!
HAROLD.
YOU FORCE ME TO DO SOMETHING I REALLY DON'T WANT TO DO.
translation.ko: 하기 싫은 걸 자꾸 강요할 거예요?

translation.en: [GASPS] WHERE ARE WE?
translation.ko: 여긴 어디죠? 안녕하세요? 뭘 드실 건지요?

translation.en: HI. WELCOME TO FRIAR'S FAT BOY! MAY I TAKE YOUR ORDER?
MY DIET IS RUINED! I HOPE YOU'RE HAPPY. ER... OK.
translation.ko: 다이어트 실패했어요 기뻐하시길! 마요네즈 뺀 르네상스 랩 둘

translation.en: TWO RENAISSANCE WRAPS, NO MAYO... CHILI RINGS...
translation.ko: 마요네즈 뺀 르네상스 랩 둘 - 양파 튀김 - 저는 중세 밀

translation.en: I'LL HAVE THE MEDIEVAL MEAL.
translation.ko: - 양파 튀김 - 저는 중세 밀 중세 밀과 당신은 감자튀김?

translation.en: ONE MEDIEVAL MEAL AND, HAROLD...
- CURLY FRIES? - NO, THANK YOU.
SOURDOUGH SOFT TACO, THEN?
translation.ko: - 난 됐어요 - 그럼 타코 요리? - 네? - 난 됐다고요

translation.en: NO, REALLY, I'M FINE.
YOUR ORDER, FAIRY GODMOTHER.
THIS COMES WITH THE MEDIEVAL MEAL.
THERE YOU ARE, DEAR.
WE MADE A DEAL, HAROLD,
AND I ASSUME YOU DON'T WANT ME TO GO BACK ON MY PART.
[SIGHS] INDEED NOT.
SO, FIONA AND CHARMING WILL BE TOGETHER.
YES. OH, BELIEVE ME, HAROLD.
IT'S WHAT'S BEST.
NOT ONLY FOR YOUR DAUGHTER,
BUT FOR YOUR KINGDOM.
WHAT AM I SUPPOSED TO DO ABOUT IT?
USE YOUR IMAGINATION.
COME ON IN, YOUR MAJESTY.
♪I LIKE MY TOWN ♪
♪WITH A LITTLE DROP OF POISON ♪
♪NOBODY KNOWS... ♪
[CLEARS THROAT] EXCUSE ME.
DO I KNOW YOU?
NO, YOU MUST BE MISTAKING ME FOR SOMEONE ELSE.
ER... EXCUSE ME. I'M LOOKING FOR THE UGLY STEPSISTER.
AH! THERE YOU ARE. RIGHT.
ER... YOU SEE, I NEED TO HAVE SOMEONE TAKEN CARE OF.
translation.ko: 손 좀 봐줬으면 싶은 자가 있어요 - 어떤 놈이죠? - 놈은 놈이 아니라

translation.en: - WHO'S THE GUY? - WELL, HE'S NOT A GUY, PER SE.
UM... HE'S AN OGRE.
HEY, BUDDY, LET ME CLUE YOU IN.
THERE'S ONLY ONE FELLOW WHO CAN HANDLE A JOB LIKE THAT,
AND, FRANKLY... HE DON'T LIKE TO BE DISTURBED.
translation.ko: 손봐주는 일이라면 도 튼 친군데 방해받는 걸 싫어해요

translation.en: WHERE COULD I FIND HIM?
HELLO?
[SURLY DEEP VOICE] WHO DARES ENTER MY ROOM?
SORRY! I HOPE I'M NOT INTERRUPTING,
BUT I'M TOLD YOU'RE THE ONE TO TALK TO ABOUT AN OGRE PROBLEM?
translation.ko: 괴물을 손봐주는 일에 도 튼 분이라죠?

translation.en: YOU ARE TOLD CORRECT.
BUT FOR THIS, I CHARGE A GREAT DEAL OF MONEY.
WOULD... THIS BE ENOUGH?
YOU HAVE ENGAGED MY VALUABLE SERVICES, YOUR MAJESTY.
translation.ko: 제가 돈 아깝지 않게 도와드립죠, 전하!

translation.en: JUST TELL ME WHERE I CAN FIND THIS OGRE.
♪EVERYONE SAYS YOU'VE JUST GOTTA LET IT GO ♪
♪I NEED SOME SLEEP ♪
[FIGURINE] DEAR KNIGHT, I PRAY THAT YOU TAKE THIS FAVOR
AS A TOKEN OF MY GRATITUDE.
[FIONA] DEAR DIARY...
SLEEPING BEAUTY IS HAVING A SLUMBER PARTY TOMORROW, BUT DAD SAYS I CAN'T GO.
translation.ko: 잠자는 숲 속의 공주가 파티를 연대

translation.en: HE NEVER LETS ME OUT AFTER SUNSET.
translation.ko: 근데 아빠가 해 떨어지면 못 나가게 해

translation.en: DAD SAYS I'M GOING AWAY FOR A WHILE.
MUST BE LIKE SOME FINISHING SCHOOL.
MOM SAYS THAT WHEN I'M OLD ENOUGH
MY PRINCE CHARMING WILL RESCUE ME FROM MY TOWER
AND BRING ME BACK TO MY FAMILY.
AND WE'LL ALL LIVE HAPPILY EVER AFTER.
translation.ko: 그 후론 우리가 영원히 행복하게 산대

translation.en: MRS. FIONA CHARMING.
MRS. FIONA CHARMING.
MRS. FIONA CHARMING.
MRS. FIONA CHARMING.
SORRY. I HOPE I'M NOT INTERRUPTING ANYTHING.
NO, NO. I WAS JUST READING A ER... A SCARY BOOK.
I WAS HOPING YOU'D LET ME APOLOGIZE FOR MY DESPICABLE BEHAVIOR EARLIER.
translation.ko: 자네한테 험하게 했던 거 사과하고 싶네

translation.en: OK.
I DON'T KNOW WHAT CAME OVER ME.
translation.ko: - 알았어요 - 왜 그랬나 모르겠어 없었던 일로 하고 새롭게…

translation.en: YOU SUPPOSE WE COULD PRETEND IT NEVER HAPPENED AND START OVER...
- LOOK, YOUR MAJESTY, I JUST... - PLEASE. CALL ME DAD.
DAD. WE BOTH ACTED LIKE OGRES.
MAYBE WE JUST NEED SOME TIME TO GET TO KNOW EACH OTHER.
translation.ko: 서로를 잘 알려면 시간이 좀 필요해요

translation.en: EXCELLENT IDEA!
translation.ko: 좋은 생각이야, 그래서 말인데 사냥에 동행하겠나?

translation.en: I WAS ACTUALLY HOPING YOU MIGHT JOIN ME FOR A MORNING HUNT.
translation.ko: 좋은 생각이야, 그래서 말인데 사냥에 동행하겠나? 부자지간처럼!

translation.en: A LITTLE FATHER-SON TIME?
I KNOW IT WOULD MEAN THE WORLD TO FIONA.
SHALL WE SAY, 7:30 BY THE OLD OAK?
[SHREK] FACE IT, DONKEY! WE'RE LOST.
WE CAN'T BE LOST. WE FOLLOWED THE KING'S INSTRUCTIONS EXACTLY.
translation.ko: 천만에! 왕이 말한 그대로야 뭐랬냐면 가장 깊숙한 숲에서

translation.en: "HEAD TO THE DARKEST PART OF THE WOODS..."
translation.ko: 뭐랬냐면 가장 깊숙한 숲에서 무시무시한 표정의 가지를 가진

translation.en: "PAST THE SINISTER TREES WITH SCARY-LOOKING BRANCHES."
THE BUSH SHAPED LIKE SHIRLEY BASSEY!
WE PASSED THAT THREE TIMES ALREADY!
translation.ko: 벌써 세 번이나 지났잖아 넌 혼자서 눈 감고도 찾는다더니?

translation.en: YOU WERE THE ONE WHO SAID NOT TO STOP FOR DIRECTIONS.
OH, GREAT. MY ONE CHANCE TO FIX THINGS UP WITH FIONA'S DAD
AND I END UP LOST IN THE WOODS WITH YOU!
translation.ko: 미아가 됐잖아 타박하지 마 난 도와주려는 거야

translation.en: DON'T GET HUFFY! I'M ONLY TRYING TO HELP.
translation.ko: 타박하지 마 난 도와주려는 거야 알아, 알아

translation.en: I KNOW! I KNOW.
- I'M SORRY, ALL RIGHT? - HEY, DON'T WORRY ABOUT IT.
I JUST REALLY NEED TO MAKE THINGS WORK WITH THIS GUY.
translation.ko: 난 장인과 가깝고 싶을 뿐이야 알아! 가서 왕과 친해 보자고!

translation.en: YEAH, SURE. NOW LET'S GO BOND WITH DADDY.
WELL, WELL, WELL, DONKEY.
I KNOW IT WAS KIND OF A TENDER MOMENT BACK THERE,
translation.ko: 성질 부릴 땐 언제고 웬 옹알이 소리? 내가 언제 그랬어?

translation.en: = BUT THE PURRING? - WHAT? I AIN'T PURRING.
translation.ko: 내가 언제 그랬어? - 이번엔 안길 거냐? - 당나귀는 옹알이 따윈 안 해

translation.en: SURE. WHAT'S NEXT? A HUG? HEY, SHREK. DONKEYS DON'T PURR.
translation.ko: - 이번엔 안길 거냐? - 당나귀는 옹알이 따윈 안 해

translation.en: WHAT DO YOU THINK I AM, SOME KIND OF A...
HA-HA! FEAR ME, IF YOU DARE!
- [HISSES] - HEY, LOOK! A LITTLE CAT.
- LOOK OUT! HE GOT A PIECE! - IT'S A CAT, DONKEY.
translation.ko: 아기래도! 이리 와 봐, 나비야! 이리 와, 나비야

translation.en: COME HERE, KITTY, KITTY.
translation.ko: 이리 와 봐, 나비야! 이리 와, 나비야 이리 와, 꼬마 나비야

translation.en: COME ON, LITTLE KITTY. COME HERE.
OH! COME HERE, LITTLE KITTY.
translation.ko: 이리 와, 꼬마 나비야 어서 나와

translation.en: - AAAAHHH! - WHOA! HOLD ON, SHREK! I'M COMING!
COME ON! GET IT OFF! GET IT OFF!
NO!
- LOOK OUT, SHREK! HOLD STILL! - GET IT OFF!
SHREK! HOLD STILL!
- DID I MISS? - NO. YOU GOT THEM.
NOW, YE OGRE, PRAY FOR MERCY FROM...
PUSS... IN BOOTS!
translation.ko: 이 몸은 장화 신은 고양이 죽여 버릴 테다

translation.en: I'LL KILL THAT CAT!
- [CHUCKLES] HAIRBALL. - OH! THAT IS NASTY!
WHAT SHOULD WE DO WITH HIM?
translation.ko: 어떻게 해버릴까? 검을 뺏고 혼내 줘

translation.en: TAKE THE SWORD AND NEUTER HIM.
translation.ko: 검을 뺏고 혼내 줘 - 개 패듯이 말이야 - 안 돼요

translation.en: GIVE HIM THE BOB BARKER TREATMENT.
OH, NO! POR FAVOR! PLEASE! I IMPLORE YOU!
translation.ko: - 개 패듯이 말이야 - 안 돼요 사적인 감정 때문이 아닙니다

translation.en: IT'S NOTHING PERSONAL, SEÑOR.
translation.ko: 사적인 감정 때문이 아닙니다 가족들 때문이에요

translation.en: I DID IT ONLY FOR MY FAMILY.
translation.ko: 가족들 때문이에요 어머닌 몸져누웠고 아버진 밥벌이로 쓰레기통 뒤져요

translation.en: MY MOTHER, SHE IS SICK. AND MY FATHER LIVES OFF THE GARBAGE!
translation.ko: 어머닌 몸져누웠고 아버진 밥벌이로 쓰레기통 뒤져요

translation.en: THE KING OFFERED ME MUCH IN GOLD AND I HAVE A LITTER OF BROTHERS...
WHOA, WHOA, WHOA!
FIONA'S FATHER PAID YOU TO DO THIS?
THE RICH KING? SI.
WELL, SO MUCH FOR DAD'S ROYAL BLESSING.
translation.ko: 왕과의 화해는 돌아오지 않는 강이 됐어

translation.en: DON'T FEEL BAD.
ALMOST EVERYBODY YOU MEET WANTS TO KILL YOU.
GEE, THANKS.
MAYBE FIONA WOULD'VE BEEN BETTER OFF IF I WERE SOME SORT OF PRINCE CHARMING.
THAT'S WHAT THE KING SAID.
OH. ER... SORRY. I THOUGHT THAT QUESTION WAS DIRECTED AT ME.
translation.ko: 미안! 난 또 나한테 물은 줄 알았어

translation.en: SHREK, FIONA KNOWS YOU'D DO ANYTHING FOR HER.
WELL, IT'S NOT LIKE I WOULDN'T CHANGE IF I COULD.
I JUST... I JUST WISH I COULD MAKE HER HAPPY.
translation.ko: 내 소망은… 내 소망은 피오나의 행복이야

translation.en: HOLD THE PHONE...
"HAPPINESS."
"A TEAR DROP AWAY."
DONKEY! THINK OF THE SADDEST THING THAT'S EVER HAPPENED TO YOU!
AH, MAN, WHERE DO I BEGIN?
FIRST THERE WAS THE TIME THAT OLD FARMER
TRIED TO SELL ME FOR SOME MAGIC BEANS.
THEN THIS FOOL HAD A PARTY AND HE HAVE THE GUESTS TRYING TO PIN THE TAIL ON ME.
translation.ko: 어떤 망나니는 파티 때 내 똥꼬에 다트 게임을 했어

translation.en: THEN THEY GOT DRUNK AND START BEATING ME WITH A STICK,
translation.ko: 취한 다음엔 몽둥이로 개 패듯이 팼어

translation.en: GOING "PIÑATA!!"
WHAT IS A PIÑATA, ANYWAY?
NO, DONKEY! I NEED YOU TO CRY!
DON'T GO PROJECTING ON ME.
I KNOW YOU'RE FEELING BAD, BUT YOU GOT TO...
YOU LITTLE, HAIRY, LITTER-LICKING SACK OF...
WHAT? IS IT ON? IS IT ON?
[CLEARS THROAT] THIS IS FAIRY GODMOTHER.
I'M EITHER AWAY FROM MY DESK OR WITH A CLIENT.
BUT IF YOU COME BY THE OFFICE,
WE'LL BE GLAD TO MAKE YOU AN APPOINTMENT.
HAVE A "HAPPY EVER AFTER."
ARE YOU UP FOR A LITTLE QUEST, DONKEY?
THAT'S MORE LIKE IT! SHREK AND DONKEY, ON ANOTHER WHIRLWIND ADVENTURE!
♪AIN'T NO STOPPIN' US NOW! WHOA! WE'RE ON THE MOVE! ♪
translation.ko: 누구도 우린 못 막아 당장 떠나자

translation.en: STOP, OGRE! I HAVE MISJUDGED YOU.
translation.ko: 잠깐, 괴물! 내가 널 잘못 봤어

translation.en: JOIN THE CLUB. WE'VE GOT JACKETS.
ON MY HONOR, I AM OBLIGED TO ACCOMPANY YOU UNTIL I HAVE SAVED YOUR LIFE
translation.ko: 나를 살려준 은인의 목숨을 구할 때까지

translation.en: AS YOU HAVE SPARED ME MINE.
THE POSITION OF ANNOYING TALKING ANIMAL HAS ALREADY BEEN TAKEN.
translation.ko: 수다쟁이 동물 캐릭터는 나 하나로 족해

translation.en: LET'S GO, SHREK. SHREK?
SHREK!
AW, COME ON, DONKEY. LOOK AT HIM... IN HIS WEE LITTLE BOOTS.
translation.ko: - 슈렉? - 이 친구를 봐 앳된 고양이 중에

translation.en: YOU KNOW, HOW MANY CATS CAN WEAR BOOTS? HONESTLY.
translation.ko: 장화랑 어울릴 고양인 흔하지 않아 - 우리가 지켜 주자 - 뭐가 어째?

translation.en: - LET'S KEEP HIM! - SAY WHAT?
AHH! LISTEN. HE'S PURRING!
translation.ko: - 옹알이를 해 - 너나 실컷 챙겨 줘

translation.en: - OH, SO NOW IT'S CUTE. - COME ON, DONKEY. LIGHTEN UP.
LIGHTEN UP? I SHOULD LIGHTEN UP? LOOK WHO'S TELLING WHO TO LIGHTEN UP!
[GIGGLES] SHREK!
SHREK?
THEY'RE BOTH FESTIVE, AREN'T THEY?
WHAT DO YOU THINK, HAROLD?
UM... YES, YES. FINE. FINE.
TRY TO AT LEAST PRETEND YOU'RE INTERESTED IN YOUR DAUGHTER'S WEDDING BALL.
HONESTLY, LILLIAN, I DON'T THINK IT MATTERS.
HOW DO WE KNOW THERE WILL EVEN BE A BALL?
MOM. DAD.
OH, HELLO, DEAR.
WHAT'S THAT, CEDRIC? RIGHT! COMING.
MOM, HAVE YOU SEEN SHREK?
I HAVEN'T. YOU SHOULD ASK YOUR FATHER.
BE SURE AND USE SMALL WORDS, DEAR. HE'S A LITTLE SLOW THIS MORNING.
translation.ko: 눈치껏 물어 기분이 안 좋아 보여

translation.en: - CAN I HELP YOU, YOUR MAJESTY? - AH, YES! UM...
MMM! EXQUISITE. WHAT DO YOU CALL THIS DISH?
THAT WOULD BE THE DOG'S BREAKFAST, YOUR MAJESTY.
AH, YES. VERY GOOD, THEN. CARRY ON, CEDRIC.
translation.ko: 아주 좋아 - 어서 가져가 보게나 - 슈렉 봤어?

translation.en: - DAD? DAD, HAVE YOU SEEN SHREK? - NO, I HAVEN'T, DEAR.
translation.ko: - 어서 가져가 보게나 - 슈렉 봤어? 못 봤어

translation.en: I'M SURE HE JUST WENT OFF TO LOOK FOR A NICE... MUD HOLE TO COOL DOWN IN.
translation.ko: 편하게 늘어져서 쉴 동굴을 찾으러 갔겠지 너희가 다툰 뒤에!

translation.en: YOU KNOW, AFTER YOUR LITTLE SPAT LAST NIGHT.
translation.ko: 동굴을 찾으러 갔겠지 너희가 다툰 뒤에!

translation.en: OH. YOU HEARD THAT, HUH?
translation.ko: 아빠도 들었어? 전국에 생중계됐더라 네 신랑한테서

translation.en: THE WHOLE KINGDOM HEARD YOU.
I MEAN, AFTER ALL IT IS IN HIS NATURE TO BE,
WELL, A BIT OF A BRUTE.
translation.ko: 난 일찌감치 난폭한 면을 알아봤어 사위 대접을 조금도 안 해줬잖아

translation.en: HIM? YOU KNOW, YOU DIDN'T EXACTLY ROLL OUT THE WELCOME WAGON.
translation.ko: 사위 대접을 조금도 안 해줬잖아 뭘 기대했어?

translation.en: WELL, WHAT DID YOU EXPECT? LOOK AT WHAT HE'S DONE TO YOU.
SHREK LOVES ME FOR WHO I AM.
translation.ko: 그인 내 모습 그대로 날 사랑해

translation.en: I WOULD THINK YOU'D BE HAPPY FOR ME.
DARLING, I'M JUST THINKING ABOUT WHAT'S BEST FOR YOU.
MAYBE YOU SHOULD DO THE SAME.
NO, REALLY?
OH, NO. THAT'S THE OLD KEEBLER'S PLACE. LET'S BACK AWAY SLOWLY.
translation.ko: 요정 괴물 사는 데야 - 몰래 돌아가자 - 요정의 공장이야

translation.en: THAT'S THE FAIRY GODMOTHER'S COTTAGE.
